Articles.Content:
[Link to main thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129098-1-0-4-RSS-Planets-Moons-expanded-0-2-1-%28Now-with-Ceres%21%29)

Hello there!

I'm currently working on an expansion pack for <abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">RSS</abbr> and Realism overhaul mod. I plan to add working biomes and height maps for all of the bodies I add.

So far, i've added jupiter's closest moon. It is named Metis and has a diameter of about 42km. Gravity is almost inexistant there.

> 
> 
> 
> ![5Mis4rH.png](http://i.imgur.com/5Mis4rH.png)
> 
> 
> 
> 
> ![Z0diC2N.png](http://i.imgur.com/Z0diC2N.png)
> 
> 

**UPDATE 2015/07/17**

Vesta is done. This dwarf planet of 525 km in diameter has a surface area roughly the same as Venezuela. It was visited by the Dawn probe in 2011.

> 
> 
> 
> ![prcel1c.png](http://i.imgur.com/prcel1c.png)
> 
> 

**UPDATE 2015/07/18**

Ceres is now out! It's made from pictures taken by the Dawn probe.

> 
> 
> 
> ![Ax2W0Pa.png](http://i.imgur.com/Ax2W0Pa.png)
> 
> 
> 
> 
> ![T9NmcAL.png](http://i.imgur.com/T9NmcAL.png)
> 
> 

**UPDATE 2015/07/18 #2**

Solved timewarp bug

Issue(s) :

Biomes are not working yet.

Vesta isn't oblate.

Not completely satisfied with Vesta. (low resolution)

**Future plans :**

All of jupiter's moons.

All of saturn's moon

Close earth objects (maybe)

Suggestions are welcome!

**Download**

[Moderator removed defunct website link]

link removed
Ok a first release is out for the ones who are courageous enough to try ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
UPDATE : Ceres is done. Pics will follow in a few hours.

You, sir, are just awesome!

![2uM09Vb.png](http://i.imgur.com/2uM09Vb.png)

Will you make more hi-res textures of Vesta and Ceres?

When i'm able to get some higher res maps, I will add them ingame if possible and if it doesn't look bad (incomplete imagery). 

I have an 8k map of Ceres that I downscaled to 1800x900... I shouldn't have done that

Hello do you know who I am? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

[spoiler=]

![Ax2W0Pa.png](http://i.imgur.com/Ax2W0Pa.png)

>

> [spoiler=]
> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/Ax2W0Pa.png](http://i.imgur.com/Ax2W0Pa.png)

You make me wanna download RSS just to see these.
That's Ceres.
UPDATE : Ceres is out with a magnificent 4k texture, complete with heightmap and normal map.
Solved the timewarp bug. It is now playable!!!
Here I come asteroid mining colony !

> 
> Here I come asteroid mining colony !

I don't know if you'll be able to mine my Planets. Tell me if it works or it. I don't even know how it works :/ anyway I will test it today or tomorrow.

> 
> I don't know if you'll be able to mine my Planets. Tell me if it works or it. I don't even know how it works :/ anyway I will test it today or tomorrow.

stock & CRP procedurally generates most resources on all bodies. It's only with really specific resources you need additional cfgs for (eg: Karborundum/Oxygen/CO2/etc)

> 
> stock & CRP procedurally generates most resources on all bodies. It's only with really specific resources you need additional cfgs for (eg: Karborundum/Oxygen/CO2/etc)

Oh that's really good to know, thank you! ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

But the mining equipment has not (yet) been tweaked by NathanKell/RO team to fit in the modpack (mostly power issues left).

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-20T06:27:25Z" title="07/20/2015 06:27  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 20, 2015</time> by MegaUZI**
I love this, I started work on adding Jupiter's moons before I found this, perhaps I could help you make this pack even bigger and better?
